about_the_game:
Looking for a fun and lewd game to kill some time? You found it! Poozle is casual, logic fun with hundreds of hours of gameplay. It's heartfelt, charming and sexy! So what are you waiting for? Play it now!

Please don't forget to add Poozle to your wishlist!


What you will find in the game:
  • Tons of CGs featuring gorgeous art of girls.
  • The best animated wallpapers and avatars on the whole Steam!
  • Awesome music and VFX.
  • Gallery with your collection of girls.
  • This game can be played with one hand, too!
  • Fun & addictive puzzle mechanics
  • Available in more than 10 languages!
  • Lots of levels to play.

The rules of this game are very simple:

Your task is to assemble balls of the same color into horizontal, vertical or diagonal rows of at least five balls.
A ball is selected by clicking on it and moved there by clicking on an empty square.
However, there must be a path of empty fields between the selectected squares.

content_descriptors.notes: Might be not safe for work. Contains Sexual Content and Nudity

legal_notice:
This game is a work of fiction. All characters or associations are a product of author's imagination; names, characters, places and incidents either are products of the author’s imagination or are used fictitiously. Any resemblance to other products or people (living or dead) or places is entirely coincidental.

Every appearing character is over 18 years old.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 +
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD Phenom X3 (or better)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10+
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 +
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD Phenom X3 (or better)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10+
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Welcome to Poozle Mania - a hentai logic puzzle game with the sexiest girls you've ever seen!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Vietnamese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese*, Simplified Chinese*, Korean*, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian*, Japanese*, Hindi, Czech*, Hungarian*
*languages with full audio support
